txt.en: It takes a stout-hearted warrior to fell a troll who has many times the girth and might of even the doughtiest of Men. Though you have taken down enough already to earn yourself a title befitting of your righteousness, to defeat yet more would surely increase your strength in battle.

Trolls are deadly servants of evil. They can often be found aiding goblins and Orcs in attacks against the Free Peoples of Middle-earth, but their stupidity is both a boon and a weakness, for their fervour in battle is blind.
